hppi_pushes_hard.text: I often push myself very hard when trying to achieve a goal.

hppi_worried_anxious.text: If I am worried or anxious about something, I will do or face it anyway.

hppi_sympathetic_warm.text: I see myself as sympathetic, warm.

hppi_dangerous_things.text: I will do things even though they seem to be dangerous.

hppi_critical_quarrelsome.text: I see myself as critical, quarrelsome.

hppi_manipulate_others.text: I tend to manipulate others to get my way.

hppi_minimum_work.text: I do only the minimum amount of work needed to get by.

hppi_flattery.text: I have used flattery to get my way.

hppi_disorganized_careless.text: I see myself as disorganized, careless.

hppi_deceit_lied.text: I have used deceit or lied to get my way.

hppi_feels_terrified.text: Even if I feel terrified, I will stay in the situation until I have done what I need to do..

hppi_treat_as_superior.text: I wouldn't want people to treat me as though I were superior to them.

hppi_dependable_disciplined.text: I see myself as dependable, self-disciplined.

hppi_face_scary.text: If there is an important reason to face something that scares me, I will face it.

hppi_checks_work.text: I often check my work over repeatedly to find any mistakes.

hppi_not_back_down.text: Even if something scares me, I will not back down.

hppi_more_respect.text: I think that I am entitled to more respect than the average person is.

hppi_ambitious_goals.text: When working, I often set ambitious goals for myself.

hppi_face_fears.text: I tend to face my fears.

hppi_ordinary_person.text: I am an ordinary person who is no better than others.

hppi_exploit_others.text: I tend to exploit others towards my own end.
